name: NSCollectionLayoutSize
desc: The width and the height of an item in a collection view.

items.name: init(widthDimension: NSCollectionLayoutDimension, heightDimension: NSCollectionLayoutDimension)
items.desc: Creates a size with the specified width and height dimensions.

items.name: var widthDimension: NSCollectionLayoutDimension
items.desc: The width dimension of an item in a collection view layout.

items.name: var heightDimension: NSCollectionLayoutDimension
items.desc: The height dimension of an item in a collection view layout.
